extendedInfo.description: A.B. Walker & Son, an independent funeral directors and monumental masons, is a fifth generation family business, serving Berkshire, South Oxfordshire and the surrounding areas. They have been specialists in funerals for over 180 years and strive to deliver a professional, respectful and personal service.App Features:Advice: Guidance for all the entire funeral process.To Do List: A useful tick list to keep you organised during the suffering of bereavement.Obituaries: List of funerals hosted by A.B. Walker & Son.Donations: A link to the Memory Giving donations page so you can give in the memory of a loved one.Contact Us: All the information and mediums to contact A.B Walker & Son for your funeral queries and support.Share: Share the app with your contacts.
